org.apache.flink.examples.java.distcp

类 FileCopyTaskInputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.examples.java.distcp.FileCopyTaskInputFormat
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, InputFormat<FileCopyTask,FileCopyTaskInputSplit>, InputSplitSource<FileCopyTaskInputSplit>

    public class FileCopyTaskInputFormat
extends java.lang.Object
implements InputFormat<FileCopyTask,FileCopyTaskInputSplit>
    An implementation of an input format that dynamically assigns FileCopyTask to the mappers that have finished previously assigned tasks.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 方法详细资料

      • configure

        public void configure(Configuration parameters)
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Configures this input format. Since input formats are instantiated generically and hence parameterless, this method is the place where the input formats set their basic fields based on configuration values.

        This method is always called first on a newly instantiated input format.

        指定者:
        configure 在接口中 InputFormat<FileCopyTask,FileCopyTaskInputSplit>
        参数:
        parameters - The configuration with all parameters (note: not the Flink config but the TaskConfig).

      • getStatistics

        public BaseStatistics getStatistics(BaseStatistics cachedStatistics)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Gets the basic statistics from the input described by this format. If the input format does not know how to create those statistics, it may return null. This method optionally gets a cached version of the statistics. The input format may examine them and decide whether it directly returns them without spending effort to re-gather the statistics.

        When this method is called, the input format it guaranteed to be configured.

        指定者:
        getStatistics 在接口中 InputFormat<FileCopyTask,FileCopyTaskInputSplit>
        参数:
        cachedStatistics - The statistics that were cached. May be null.
        返回:
        The base statistics for the input, or null, if not available.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • createInputSplits

        public FileCopyTaskInputSplit[] createInputSplits(int minNumSplits)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Creates the different splits of the input that can be processed in parallel.

        When this method is called, the input format it guaranteed to be configured.

        指定者:
        createInputSplits 在接口中 InputFormat<FileCopyTask,FileCopyTaskInputSplit>
        指定者:
        createInputSplits 在接口中 InputSplitSource<FileCopyTaskInputSplit>
        参数:
        minNumSplits - The minimum desired number of splits. If fewer are created, some parallel instances may remain idle.
        返回:
        The splits of this input that can be processed in parallel.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, when the creation of the splits was erroneous.

      • getInputSplitAssigner

        public InputSplitAssigner getInputSplitAssigner(FileCopyTaskInputSplit[] inputSplits)
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Gets the type of the input splits that are processed by this input format.
        指定者:
        getInputSplitAssigner 在接口中 InputFormat<FileCopyTask,FileCopyTaskInputSplit>
        指定者:
        getInputSplitAssigner 在接口中 InputSplitSource<FileCopyTaskInputSplit>
        返回:
        The type of the input splits.

      • open

        public void open(FileCopyTaskInputSplit split)
          throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Opens a parallel instance of the input format to work on a split.

        When this method is called, the input format it guaranteed to be configured.

        指定者:
        open 在接口中 InputFormat<FileCopyTask,FileCopyTaskInputSplit>
        参数:
        split - The split to be opened.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the spit could not be opened due to an I/O problem.

      • reachedEnd

        public boolean reachedEnd()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Method used to check if the end of the input is reached.

        When this method is called, the input format it guaranteed to be opened.

        指定者:
        reachedEnd 在接口中 InputFormat<FileCopyTask,FileCopyTaskInputSplit>
        返回:
        True if the end is reached, otherwise false.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if an I/O error occurred.

      • nextRecord

        public FileCopyTask nextRecord(FileCopyTask reuse)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Reads the next record from the input.

        When this method is called, the input format it guaranteed to be opened.

        指定者:
        nextRecord 在接口中 InputFormat<FileCopyTask,FileCopyTaskInputSplit>
        参数:
        reuse - Object that may be reused.
        返回:
        Read record.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if an I/O error occurred.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Method that marks the end of the life-cycle of an input split. Should be used to close channels and streams and release resources. After this method returns without an error, the input is assumed to be correctly read.

        When this method is called, the input format it guaranteed to be opened.

        指定者:
        close 在接口中 InputFormat<FileCopyTask,FileCopyTaskInputSplit>
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the input could not be closed properly.
